## Code of Conduct

- **Be respectful and kind** to everyone.

- **Ask questions freely** ‚Äì no question is too small.

- **Bring your own internet** ‚Äì mobile hotspot or data plan required.

- **Arrive 5 minutes early** to settle in before each session.

- **Location:** All classes will be held at **Mata Ramabai Auditorium, 1st Floor, Dr. Ambedkar Bhawan.**
